attributes.action: Use all available means at his disposal, to fight to bring Britain through the international financial crisis that is now engulfing the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the amount of media cover given to removing the prime minister, and the obvious conservative tie up to attempts to blacken the prime ministers name, in newspapers and on television, especially the bbc, make it imperative that those that support the prime ministers actions in handling the financial confidence crisis,should have an opportunity to sign a petition of support.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
